description.narrative:
Insatsen övergripande mål:
Overall objective: "Organisations of Persons with Disabilities (OPDs) and other civil society organizations (CSOs) are using social accountability to participate in inclusive policy making towards contributing to good governance for people with disabilities, especially girls and boys, in the cities of Parañaque, Taguig and Municipality of Pateros".
Insatsens specifika mål:
Specific objective 1: "OPDs, other CSOs and communities in target cities/municipality are strengthened and empowered to influence governance processes towards gender sensitive and disabilityinclusive social protection and basic services for persons with disabilities, especially girls and boys".
Specific objective 2: "Local government units (LGUs) in target cities/municipality operate gender sensitive and inclusive formal systems or mechanisms for engagement and collaboration with CSOs and communities towards addressing the concerns of persons with disabilities, especially girls and boys."

Rädda Barnen (Save the Children Sweden) has applied to Sida for funding of 567 725 SEK to carry out the EU-project "Strengthening the Capacity of Organizations of Persons with Disabilities and Other Civil Society Organizations Towards Effective Civil Society-Local Government Engagement and Improved Government Accountability for Persons with Disabilities, Especially Children in the Cities of Parañaque and Taguig, and Municipality of Pateros" during 2021-2023.
The project aims to:
1. "Organisations of Persons with Disabilities (OPDs) and other civil society organizations (CSOs) are using social accountability to participate in inclusive policy making towards contributing to good governance for people with disabilities, especially girls and boys, in the cities of Parañaque, Taguig and Municipality of Pateros".
2. "OPDs, other CSOs and communities in target cities/municipality are strengthened and empowered to influence governance processes towards gender sensitive and disabilityinclusive social protection and basic services for persons with disabilities, especially girls and boys".
3. "Local government units (LGUs) in target cities/municipality operate gender sensitive and inclusive formal systems or mechanisms for engagement and collaboration with CSOs and communities towards addressing the concerns of persons with disabilities, especially girls and boys."
Rädda Barnen will collaborate with local partner organisations "Affiliated Network for Social Accountability in East Asia and the Pacific Foundation" (ANSA), "NORFIIL", and "Life Haven". Rädda Barnen has the overall responsibility for the coordination and implementation of the project.
The contribution has the EU Commission reference number CSO-LA/2020/419-489. The contribution's total budget is 555 556 EUR, which corresponds to approximately 5 619 133 SEK. The requested support from Sida is 567 725 SEK, which corresponds to 10% of the total budget.

Rädda Barnen har ansökt om finansiering av egeninsats om 567 725 SEK för EU-projektet "Strengthening the Capacity of Organizations of Persons with Disabilities and Other Civil Society Organizations Towards Effective Civil Society-Local Government Engagement and Improved Government Accountability for Persons with Disabilities, Especially Children in the Cities of Parañaque and Taguig, and Municipality of Pateros" för perioden 2021-2023.
Insatsen syftar till att:
1. "Organisations of Persons with Disabilities (OPDs) and other civil society organizations (CSOs) are using social accountability to participate in inclusive policy making towards contributing to good governance for people with disabilities, especially girls and boys, in the cities of Parañaque, Taguig and Municipality of Pateros".
2. "OPDs, other CSOs and communities in target cities/municipality are strengthened and empowered to influence governance processes towards gender sensitive and disabilityinclusive social protection and basic services for persons with disabilities, especially girls and boys".
3. "Local government units (LGUs) in target cities/municipality operate gender sensitive and inclusive formal systems or mechanisms for engagement and collaboration with CSOs and communities towards addressing the concerns of persons with disabilities, especially girls and boys."
Rädda Barnen kommer att arbeta i samverkan med organisationerna "Affiliated Network for Social Accountability in East Asia and the Pacific Foundation" (ANSA), "NORFIIL", och "Life Haven". Rädda Barnen har det övergripande ansvaret för projektets implementering och koordinering.
Den aktuella insatsen har EU-kommissionens referensnummer CSO-LA/2020/419-489. Insatsen har en total budget på 555 556 EUR, vilket motsvarar cirka 5 619 133 SEK. Av detta har Rädda Barnen beviljats 500 000 EUR från EU-kommissionen och ansöker om 567 725 SEK (cirka 10%) från Sida.

tag.narrative: 10.2 - By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

10.2 - Till 2030 möjliggöra och verka för att alla människors, oavsett ålder, kön, funktionsnedsättning, ras, etnicitet, ursprung, religion eller ekonomisk eller annan ställning, blir inkluderade i det sociala, ekonomiska och politiska livet.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.1 - Avskaffa alla former av diskriminering av alla kvinnor och flickor överallt
5.1 - End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere.
